dcterms:description: The MS COCO 2017 dataset is used as a benchmark for evaluating instance segmentation methods, providing a large-scale dataset with images containing common objects in context.
dcterms:title: MS COCO 2017

dcterms:description: ESE-Seg is a dataset used for training networks to predict shape vectors that encode object contours using function approximations.

dcterms:description: PolarMask is a dataset that provides a dense regression of distances from the mask center to points on the outer contour in polar coordinates for instance segmentation.
dcterms:title: PolarMask
